name: Podiatry
description: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides anyone in need with the following podiatry heath care services: - Foot care - Treatment for bunions - Diabetic foot exams A podiatrist can help if your feet or legs are injured or unwell. You might have: - Problems walking - Pain in your lower limbs - Issues from diabetes - Bunions - Stress from sports activities - Injuries
